name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Python Engineer with 10+ years of extensive experience in delivering high-performance software solutions. Proficient in **Python**, **Django**, and **FastAPI** for backend development, along with **RESTful** and **GraphQL** API design to enhance system interoperability. Solid expertise in database management and integration with **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**, ensuring efficient data handling. Experience in implementing authentication mechanisms using **JWT** and **OAuth2** to secure applications and user data. Skilled in deploying applications on cloud platforms like **AWS S3** and **Google Cloud Storage**, utilizing **Docker** for containerization to streamline deployment workflows.

In addition to core development skills, adept in CI/CD practices, enabling smooth integration and delivery processes. Brings practical experience in **debugging** and problem-solving, with a track record of building secure and maintainable solutions compliant with industry standards. Known for driving real-world impact through innovative software design and development initiatives.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable, full-stack solutions leveraging **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask) and **RESTful** architecture, ensuring compliance with industry regulations and standards.
• Developed robust backend services using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Django ORM** for efficient data storage and retrieval, optimizing data interactions for healthcare and finance sectors with a focus on performance.
• Utilized **Docker** for containerization and implemented CI/CD practices, leading to faster deployment cycles and enhanced reliability across **multiple environments**.
• Built and integrated secure APIs using **JWT** and **OAuth2**, enhancing authentication for client-facing applications and ensuring secure data transactions.
• Collaborated on architectural decisions to create microservices using industry-standard practices, ensuring **high availability** and fault tolerance in production environments.
• Established data workflows for analytics using **SQLAlchemy**, embedding complex data queries and transformation logic to improve operational KPIs.
• Employed debugging techniques and advanced problem-solving skills to enhance application performance, reducing runtime errors by **up to 25%**.
• Participated in Agile development methodologies, contributing to sprint planning and retrospectives to continuously improve team efficiency and output.
• Led the integration of payment solutions like **Stripe** and **PayPal**, significantly streamlining transaction processes in web applications, achieving **100% reliability** in payment processing.
• Provided mentorship and guidance to junior engineers, fostering knowledge sharing and improving team capabilities in modern software practices. 
• Maintained comprehensive documentation for all services built, ensuring clarity and technical guidance for future development and maintenance.

Utilized **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** to lead the development of scalable and maintainable financial platforms, enhancing system throughput for high-volume transactions by over **30%**.
Employed **Flask** for creating RESTful and GraphQL APIs, ensuring secure authentication through **JWT** and **OAuth2**, improving user access management for over **100,000** users.
Worked with **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB** to design data models that optimize storage and retrieval, achieving a reduction in query response time by **25%**.
Implemented containerization using **Docker** for application deployment, establishing a CI/CD pipeline that decreased deployment times from hours to mere **minutes**.
Applied problem-solving skills to debug complex issues across the tech stack, leading to a **40%** decrease in bug resolution time and improved system reliability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams on integrating payment gateways such as **Stripe** and **PayPal**, which increased customer transactions by **50%** in the first quarter post-implementation.
Leveraged **AWS S3** and **Google Cloud Storage** for efficient data storage solutions, ensuring compliance with data security regulations for handling sensitive financial information.

• Developed and optimized backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (Django, FastAPI) and RESTful APIs, achieving **99.9%** uptime across crucial modules like checkout and order fulfillment.
• Implemented secure user authentication and authorization using **JWT** and **OAuth2**, enhancing user data protection and ensuring compliance with GDPR standards.
• Engineered efficient data handling and retrieval through integrations with **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, capable of processing over **10,000** transactions per minute.
• Led secure payment processing by integrating Stripe and PayPal, ensuring PCI compliance and managing sensitive data transactions with encrypted tokens.
• Employed **Docker** for containerization and **CI/CD** practices, ensuring seamless deployment processes and reducing application downtime during updates.
• Spearheaded debugging and problem-solving efforts that reduced incident response time by **30%**, while also streamlining issue resolution processes on the backend.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement features using **Flask**, creating RESTful services that improved system scalability and responsiveness.
• Established robust data handling protocols using **SQLAlchemy** and **Django ORM**, optimizing query performance and ensuring data integrity.
• Maintained version control and collaborative coding standards through **Git**, facilitating teamwork and code quality improvements across the development team.
